game.name: American Football Challenge
game.description:
Wow! Your dream of becoming a member of a rugby team is going to come true today! You are going to play the role a champion rugby player in American Football Challenge. Be fast and try to enter the field fast as the crowd is already screaming and eyes of your team and opponents are on you! Everyone knows that you have the guts to catch a significant number of footballs to make your team win. Do not let them disappoint and show the world that you are best in rugby no matter who is your opponent.

Your objective in this brand new sports game is to catch as many footballs as you can to go through multiple levels. Grab your gloves and helmet, and be prepared to defend the goal line of your opponent team! It is a big game so keep your high school and college teams practice aside. This is one of the most professional leagues you have ever played. Your opponent will keep throwing the oval-shaped football at you and your job is to catch it every time to stop your opponent scoring against you.

There are 10 unique and challenging levels to play through and you have to guide your character to progress through different levels. Track your current score and number of throws by looking at the top of the screen in this cool rugby game! Your opponent will throw balls at you 5 times and you have to catch at least 3 times to win the game. You would lose the game if you fail in catching the ball the required number of times. Put your quick reflexes to stop the ball and complete each level! Beat your opponents in all levels to become the best rugby player ever!
